Posted By: Kryptnyt (9/13/2010 6:48:01 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: I generally like the Zendikons. Especially this one because it's Oozy. What bothers me is that this is obviously a swamp come alive and yet you can use it on an island or even a mountain or plain. It just doesn't fit the flavor. I would have liked to see this cards limited to the appropriate land type or at least given a penalty for being used on an inappropriate land type. The problem is, I suppose, that such an ability would not be very much in step with the complexity level of commons.
posts.html:

It just doesn't fit the flavor. I would have liked to see this cards limited to the appropriate land type or at least given a penalty for being used on an inappropriate land type. The problem is, I suppose, that such an ability would not be very much in step with the complexity level of commons.
